title: Lady Summer Watch Face
summary: Cute and stylish floral watch face for ladies. Touch of summertime on your wrist
description: Lady Summer - pretty interactive watch face for ladies. 8 cute and stylish floral themes especially for Summertime! Designed for women who love their smart watch and prefer feminine style.Works on Moto 360, Moto 360-2, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch and other Android Wear devices.Supports round and square displays. Time display: 12/24 hours.  Key features:✔ Interactive Watch Face✔ Date✔ Day of the week.✔ Time format: hh:mm:ss(optional)✔ Watch battery indicator.✔ Phone battery indicator.✔ Weather.✔ Selected theme in ambient mode.Settings:✔ Select time format (12/24)✔ Seconds on/off✔ Select theme✔ Enable/disable the selected theme in ambient mode.✔ Select weather update period✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)To install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose  Lady Summer Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.Common Synchronization problem & solution.If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'- uninstall the watch face- disconnect watch from phone- restart your watch device- reconnect watch and phone- install the Lady Summer watch face once againIn case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star. Contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
descriptionHTML:
Lady Summer - pretty interactive watch face for ladies. 8 cute and stylish floral themes especially for Summertime! Designed for women who love their smart watch and prefer feminine style.
Works on Moto 360, Moto 360-2, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch and other Android Wear devices.
Supports round and square displays.

Time display: 12/24 hours.

Key features:

✔ Interactive Watch Face
✔ Date
✔ Day of the week.
✔ Time format: hh:mm:ss(optional)
✔ Watch battery indicator.
✔ Phone battery indicator.
✔ Weather.
✔ Selected theme in ambient mode.

Settings:
✔ Select time format (12/24)
✔ Seconds on/off
✔ Select theme
✔ Enable/disable the selected theme in ambient mode.
✔ Select weather update period
✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)


To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Lady Summer Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.

Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.

Common Synchronization problem & solution.
If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:
- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'
- uninstall the watch face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart your watch device
- reconnect watch and phone
- install the Lady Summer watch face once again

In case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star. Contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
comments: I use to love this watch face.  It doesn't appear to work properly on Wear 2.0. I can't customize which background I get.
Love the watch face but hate the crashing I love this watch face but it crashes over and over at least once a day at random times.
recentChanges: + Fixed issue with crashing on some devices
+ Compatibility is extended : fully compatible with Moto 360-2 and Huawei Watch
+ GUI improved and minor issues fixed.
